00029       size_t writeData(void *buffer, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *userp){
00030         LOGI("Using the default writedata Function.");
00031 
00032         std::ofstream outfile ("curlget.xml", ios::out);
00033 
00034         if (outfile){
00035           outfile << (char*)buffer <<endl;
00036         }
00037         else{
00038           LOGE("An error occured while opening curlget.txt.");
00039         }
00040         outfile.close();
00041         return nmemb;
00042       }
